com.db.chart.view

Class ChartView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.db.chart.view.ChartView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseBarChartView, LineChartView

    public abstract class ChartView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Abstract class to be extend to define any chart that implies axis.

        public void reset()
        Method not expected to be used often. More for testing. Resets chart state to insert new configuration.

      • updateValues

        public ChartView updateValues(int setIndex,
                     float[] values)
        Update set values. Animation support in case previously added.
        Parameters:
        setIndex - Index of set to be updated
        values - Array of new values. Array length must match current data

      • notifyDataUpdate

        public void notifyDataUpdate()
        Notify ChartView about updated values. ChartView will be validated.

      • setTooltips

        public void setTooltips(Tooltip tip)
        Set the Tooltip object which will be used to create chart tooltips.
        Parameters:
        tip - Tooltip object in order to produce chart tooltips

      • showTooltip

        public void showTooltip(Tooltip tooltip,
               boolean correctPos)
        Adds a tooltip to ChartView. If is not the case already, the whole tooltip is forced to be inside ChartView bounds.
        Parameters:
        tooltip - Tooltip view to be added
        correctPos - False if tooltip should not be forced to be inside ChartView. You may want to take care of it

      • dismissAllTooltips

        public void dismissAllTooltips()
        Removes all tooltips currently presented in the chart.

        Parameters:
        index - Position of ChartSet
        anim - Animation extending BaseStyleAnimation

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent event)
        The method listens chart clicks and checks whether it intercepts a known Region. It will then use the registered Listener.onClick to return the region's index.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class android.view.View

        Inner Chart refers only to the area where chart data will be draw, excluding labels, axis, etc.
        Returns:
        Position of the inner right side of the chart

      • setYLabels

        public ChartView setYLabels(AxisController.LabelPosition position)
        Show/Hide Y labels and respective axis.
        Parameters:
        position - NONE - No labels OUTSIDE - Labels will be positioned outside the chart INSIDE - Labels will be positioned inside the chart

      • setAxisBorderValues

        public ChartView setAxisBorderValues(int minValue,
                            int maxValue,
                            int step)
        A step is seen as the step to be defined between 2 labels. As an example a step of 2 with a maxAxisValue of 6 will end up with {0, 2, 4, 6} as labels.
        Parameters:
        maxValue - The maximum value that Y axis will have as a label
        step - (real) value distance from every label
        Returns:
        ChartView self-reference.
